text: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff. Very happy to buy things from here.
Lady boss here is very friendly and helpful. A lot of Sumikkogurashi products.
LadyBoss and the staff here is very friendly and helpful. It's fun to be back here again with all my purchase!

When seeking assistance or inquiring about products, I expected courteous and helpful responses. Instead, I was met with condescension and dismissive replies that left me feeling frustrated and belittled. I believe it is essential for your staff to understand that customers visit your store seeking not only products but also a positive and respectful shopping experience.

Furthermore, I was taken aback by the apparent arrogance and ego displayed by some of your staff members. It is perplexing to witness such inflated egos in individuals who are primarily responsible for selling plushies and figurines. The unnecessary haughtiness and superiority complex exhibited by your staff were not only uncalled for but also created an unwelcoming and hostile atmosphere within your store.
The ladyboss is super friendly and nice. The items here are super cute. We ended up buying alot and VIP can get 5%off ! Awesome service. Will come back again.
